text: I have a client who is super concerned about Membership emails going to spam. Their current email doesn't go to MY spam folder, but I am trying to verify that it won't ever go to spam for any user. Is there a silver bullet for this? Or is it just don't use info@ or noreply?
What do you mean by membership emails?
Like when someone gets access to private list? and HubSpot sends them an email? Just like the ticket portal for example
<@U01QVR44MEY> yes that is correct. Basically any invitation emails, password resets etc. need to be verified not-spam
Yeah I'm 90% sure HubSpot sends those as transactional
